title: Looking for an old post
body: So, I don't know if anyone here will actually know the game, as it HAS been close to 8 years since it happened. Long ago, there was a contest known as the CSC (Champion Suggestion Contest), which I ran. One of the submissions was a character who wielded a giant sword that attacked differently based on the position of the blade compared to the enemy. Because the archives are total garbage, and I don't even have the ability to find my OWN posts from that long ago, does ANYONE know who created it and/or what the champion's name was? This is a long shot, so I'll be amazed if anyone does, but I'm really wanting to find them again. Thanks!

replies.body:
Okay, well, guess I don't need this post anymore. I FINALLY FOUND IT!

For anyone curious: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=159606

Noice a refreshing simple,yet fun fan made reference post that gives credit, geez I thought you were joking about directonal(couldn't find it thought it was a whip sword), but it actually was using angle lateral degrees with a giant buster sword. You'd probably used math and deductive reasoning outta the 1310 champion concept pages x10-20, grats.

Actually, I looked through various posts from the contests around the last time I ran it, and found a post from the contest before the one he was in, then I simply looked for the next contest, and found the link XD

But that DID require looking through roughly 1500 pages of the forums :/
w/ rework of the site anything b4 it/ 3 yrs old has been removed

> [{quoted}](name=VICKLIUS,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XWlIjPPO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-19T13:10:38.584+0000)
>
> w/ rework of the site anything b4 it/ 3 yrs old has been removed

You can still access the old forums. I've got them open right now.

UN: Dystory
PW: Rinoku,Prodigy of ~~Aatrox~~ Darkness

Re: Is this what you were looking for?

> [{quoted}](name=Peritheus,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=XWlIjPPO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-19T11:18:16.252+0000)
>
> UN: Dystory
> PW: Rinoku,Prodigy of ~~Aatrox~~ Darkness
> 
> Re: Is this what you were looking for?

Nope. This guy didn't have any activated abilities as far as I remember. It was all passive.

I think the attacks were a poke if the sword was pointing at the enemy, swinging the sword from behind to in front if the sword was behind, and swinging the sword from the side to behind if the sword was to one side.

Pretty sure the sword was suppose to be on a wheel or something because it was THAT big.
